name: Deception Detection Techniques
description: Methods for identifying deception and manipulation in verbal and written communication.

cards.title: Statement Analysis and Truth Verification
cards.description: Using forensic linguistic techniques to evaluate credibility.
bulletpoints: Identify linguistic patterns associated with deception
Analyze pronoun use, distancing language, and passive voice
Apply forensic statement analysis for investigative interviews

cards.title: Voice Stress and Acoustic Deception Detection
cards.description: Detecting stress-based deception in verbal communication.
bulletpoints: Measure micro-tremors and vocal stress under pressure
Analyze speech hesitation, filler words, and pitch modulation
Use AI-driven voice profiling to assess truthfulness

cards.title: Nonverbal Cues and Body Language Analysis
cards.description: Detecting deception through involuntary physical behaviors.
bulletpoints: Identify microexpressions that reveal concealed emotions
Analyze body posture, hand movements, and eye contact shifts
Assess inconsistencies between verbal and nonverbal communication

cards.title: Baseline Analysis and Behavioral Shifts
cards.description: Establishing normal behavior patterns to detect deviations.
bulletpoints: Create a subject's baseline behavior during neutral questioning
Detect subtle shifts in speech rate, tone, or physical movement
Assess deviations from baseline under stress or scrutiny

cards.title: Written Text Deception Analysis
cards.description: Identifying deception in written communication and documents.
bulletpoints: Detect excessive vagueness, unnecessary details, and linguistic distancing
Analyze sentence structure and word choice for inconsistencies
Apply stylometric analysis to compare writing patterns

cards.title: Psychophysiological Methods for Deception Detection
cards.description: Using physiological responses to assess deception indicators.
bulletpoints: Measure autonomic nervous system responses such as heart rate and sweating
Analyze pupil dilation and blink rates during questioning
Use polygraph data in conjunction with linguistic and behavioral analysis
